text:
At Mistral, we are focused on
making generative AI ubiquitous
for all developers and all enterprises.

Big focus on helping
organizations that are regulated
or digital native to make the best out
of generative AI in their businesses.
We really believe

that generative AI should
be put in everybody's hands

that generative AI has to
provide benefits for customers,
small, medium, or large.

It means that we believe that
portability, customization,
but also efficiency are critical aspects

of deploying generative
AI in the enterprise.
What makes our partnership
with AWS very unique is our availability

as a first party product.
We're driving innovation

by having data and models
all in one place on Bedrock,

and our customers are getting
support from very skilled AI

consultants that help customers
drive value from proof
of concept to production.

Our customers are
experiencing a lot of benefits
by working together with Mistral
and Bedrock from security features

that are embedded into
the Bedrock environment.
It's access to tools
and documentation to make live experiments
and production use cases easier.

Together with Amazon Bedrock,
we're building the future

of generative AI every
day by enabling customers

to easily go into a proof
of concept, move that proof
of concept to production

and scale use cases across
multiple parts of the business
for the enterprise.
